column4: Enter a year or a historical period keyword to which the data relate. Examples: 1595; Renaissance

Enter the geographical coordinates of the location of the area or site as a central point, in RD (Rijksdriehoekstelsel) without separators, or in Latitude/Longitude degrees as decimal degrees. Examples: X=83500/Y=455200; Longitude=4.3454/Latitude=52.0807
Enter an X-coordinate in RD (Rijksdriehoekstelsel) without separator, or a Longitude coordinate in decimal degrees.
Enter an Y-coordinate in RD (Rijksdriehoekstelsel) without separator, or a Latitude coordinate in decimal degrees.
Specify the used reference system in the drop-down menu

Enter the geographical coordinates of the location of the area or site as a spatial box covering the entire area, in RD (Rijksdriehoekstelsel) without separators, or in Latitude/Longitude degrees as decimal degrees.
Enter the upper bound Y-coordinate in RD (Rijksdriehoekstelsel) without separator, or a Latitude coordinate in decimal degrees.
Enter the right bound X-coordinate in RD (Rijksdriehoekstelsel) without separator, or a Longitude coordinate in decimal degrees.
Enter the lower bound Y-coordinate in RD (Rijksdriehoekstelsel) without separator, or a Latitude coordinate in decimal degrees.
Enter the left bound X-coordinate in RD (Rijksdriehoekstelsel) without separator, or a Longitude coordinate in decimal degrees.
Specify the used reference system in the drop-down menu
Select the country to which the publication and/or dataset applies.
Enter geographical keywords to which the publication and/or dataset applies. Examples: Beekweg Venray Gemeente Venray Limburg Roerstreek
